i18n.key: URL through which the message can be submitted. This URL will be automatically completed in order to transmit the data to the page.
name of the URL parameter containing the URL of the link to share.
This is the name of the URL parameter containing the title of the link to share.
This is the model on which the title will be built. Two parameters are available: {PAGE_TITLE} and {PAGE_URL}.
This is the name of the URL parameter containing the description of the link to share.
This is the model on which the description will be built. Two parameters are available: {PAGE_TITLE} and {PAGE_URL}.
